a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Long-run unemployment and real wage growth across the OECD
Unit 16 'Technological progress, employment, and living standards in the long run’ Section 16.8
'Institutions and policies: Why do some countries do better than others?' in The CORE Team, The
Real wage growth (average annual growth rate, 1970-2011)
